sentences.english: I have this right mindfulness, said Tathagata name, Lime Road, survive the Pure Land.
sentences.chinese: 我今正念，稱如來名，爲菩提道，求生淨土。

sentences.english: Right mindfulness is a shield that protects us from our enemies.
sentences.chinese: 正念如盾牌，可以抵禦強敵，何衛自身。

sentences.english: Mindfulness has become a popular and fashionable activity in recent times.
sentences.chinese: 正念是最近時尚流行的一種意識行爲。

sentences.english: You embrace your beloved with mindfulness.
sentences.chinese: 你用正念擁抱你的所愛。

sentences.english: The Buddha's heir, aware and mindful.
sentences.chinese: 以正念明覺，爲佛陀的法的繼承人。

sentences.english: Because we know that mindful eating can help save our planet.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們知道正念的進食有助於拯救我們的地球。

sentences.english: As a result, mindful couples have more satisfying relationships.
sentences.chinese: 結果是，正念的夫婦有更令人滿意的婚姻關係。

sentences.english: Mindfulness itself does not condemn our reactions.
sentences.chinese: 正念禪修是不去譴責我們的反應的。

sentences.english: Don't jump up and rush off, but mingle your mindfulness with everyday life.
sentences.chinese: 不要跳起來就跑走，讓你的正念與日常生活融合。

sentences.english: We inherit, we profit from the mindfulness coming from everyone in the assembly.
sentences.chinese: 我們將從任何一個會衆的正念中受益。

sentences.english: Mindfulness may even slow the progression of HIV.
sentences.chinese: 正念甚至可以減緩艾滋病毒的進展。

sentences.english: Following the sound of the bell, my breath brings me back to the safe island of mindfulness.
sentences.chinese: 跟隨着鐘聲，我的呼吸將我帶回正念的安全島。

sentences.english: Planning allows us to practice mindfulness by reducing the burdens that the mind needs to worry about.
sentences.chinese: 規劃讓我們可以通過減輕困擾大腦的負擔來練習正念。

sentences.english: In this way sati can arise and it can be developed.
sentences.chinese: 如此就可以產生並發展正念。

sentences.english: Heedless people are people who are dead already.
sentences.chinese: 沒有正念的人就是已經死了的人。
